name: EUROCORD AiSBL
goal: Notre association regroupe les intérêts techniques et relationnels (au niveau européen) des producteurs européens de corderies et filets en fibre synthétique.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Our main focus is on Anti-dumping, Ocean plastics directive
and Free trade Agreements
